name: Kalayaan
startIntroPart1: Mabuhay! Welcome to Kalayaan! The world's largest farming company on Earth and today, we are sending some hopefuls to the cosmos.
startIntroPart2: We here at Kalayaan Corporation, we provide the best crops and livestock available to the masses not just in the country of the Philippines but the whole world and the universe. Our plants and livestock is resistant to climate change and other natural disasters such as what we commonly get here in my country yearly, typhoons. We also make sure that our agricultural products are of high quality and ethically sourced, free from slavery and child labor. So what are you waiting for? Get your food to Kalayaan Corporation! Kalayaan Corporation, Feed your life.
declaringWar: I can't stand you anymore. Para sa Kalayaan!
attacked: We have defeated aliens before so, it will be easy to defeat other humans.
defeated: I'm so sorry, please take my land and take care of my people.
introduction: Kamusta, welcome to Kalayaan. Don't fear us, as long as your a human, we will be your friends..
